text: Even if really WAS readily available 'Wonder #Vaccine for all' at best would be approx 90% effective for < > 60% of population; i.e. around 54%, & need boosters every 6 months with something equally effective. Regret not magic fix or reason for #MarkDrakeford's #COVID19 Passports https://t.co/f5EhhzGHrL
